name: CSSearchableItem
desc: An item that can be indexed and made available to users when they search on their devices.

items.name: init(uniqueIdentifier: String?, domainIdentifier: String?, attributeSet: CSSearchableItemAttributeSet)
items.desc: Returns a searchable item associated with the specified identifier, domain identifier, and attribute set.

items.name: var attributeSet: CSSearchableItemAttributeSet
items.desc: The set of attributes that contain metadata associated with the item in a CSSearchableItemAttributeSet object.

items.name: var domainIdentifier: String?
items.desc: An optional identifier that represents the domain or owner of the item.

items.name: var expirationDate: Date!
items.desc: The date after which the searchable item should no longer exist.

items.name: var uniqueIdentifier: String
items.desc: The value that uniquely identifies the searchable item within your app.

items.name: let CSSearchableItemActionType: String
items.desc: Indicates that the activity type to continue is related to a searchable item.

items.name: let CSSearchableItemActivityIdentifier: String
items.desc: Provides the key within the NSUserActivity object’s userInfo dictionary for which the value is the searchable item’s unique identifier .

items.name: let CSQueryContinuationActionType: String
items.desc: Indicates that the activity type to continue is a search or query.

items.name: let CSSearchQueryString: String
items.desc: Provides the key within the NSUserActivity object’s userInfo dictionary for which the value is the string that represents the user’s current query.
